content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '2N0&b#PNOAN'
GO
ALTER MASTER KEY ADD ENCRYPTION BY SERVICE MASTER KEY
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL MSI_CRED
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Service Identity';

IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'EDS_SynapseDvDemo')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SynapseDvDemo]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SynapseDvDemo] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo',
	CREDENTIAL = [MSI_CRED]
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_Parquet] WITH 
(
	FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
)


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT EFF_CSV_NoHeader
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '~~',
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False)
)
